Trite: (adj) lacking freshness or originality, lacking effectiveness due to overuse, cliche
Undermine: (v) weaken cause to collapse by digging away at the foundation (of a building or an argument); injure or attack in a secretive or underhanded way
Ubiquitous: (adj) existing everywhere at the same time
Vacillate: (v) waver in one's mind or opinions, be indecisive
Unprecedented: (adj) never before known or seen, without having happened previously
Unequivocal: (adj) unambiguous, clear, absolute; having only one possible meaning
Venerate: (v) revere, regard with deep respect and awe
Unseemly: (adj) improper, inappropriate, against the rules of taste or politeness
